string-array.item: For nearly 50 years we have been making trusted product, backed by science, and made with only the purest ingredients guaranteed. So you can get the most out of life every day. 200 mg of L-Theanine per serving Supports a calm. relaxed mood Guaranteed Quality Laboratory Tested

BiO-LiFE Multivitamins with Minerals are needed for optimum vitality, better health and it helps to supplement an unbalanced diet in an excellent once-a-day dose. Multivitamins and minerals contains 18 types of vitamins and mineral in maintaining every day well-being. 

How does Multivitamin with minerals help? 
Vitamin A is essential for the functioning of eyes 
Vitamin D3 is needed for the absorption and utilization of calcium and phosphorus 
Vitamin E helps in the red blood cells production 
Vitamin B1 aids in the maintenance of growth, vision and tissue differentiation 
Vitamin B2 helps the body to utilize energy from food 
Vitamin B3 helps the body in utilization of energy from food 
Vitamin B5 helps to metabolize fats and carbohydrates 
Vitamin B6 helps the body to metabolize proteins, fats and carbohydrates 
Vitamin C is needed for healthy bones, teeth, gums and general well-being 
Calcium helps in development of strong bones and teeth 
Magnesium is an essential component of bone and cartilage 
Iron is needed in the red blood cell formation 
Zinc is needed for growth 
Vitamin B12 aids in the formation of red blood cell 
Folic acid aids in the formation of red blood cells 
Biotin helps to metabolize fats and carbohydrates 
Iodine is essential for the formation of thyroid hormone 
Selenium helps to protect cellular tissues and membranes against oxidative damage.
